page.title: 03UB (FOODS) Limited
page.content: The company has been associated with Ashby and the surrounding areas for over 50 years,trading formally as Meridith and Drew before merging with UB. There 2000 employees in Ashby's 2 factory sites,also including distribution depots,product development,and a technical services department. The biscuit factory produces mainly for "Their own "label market,biscuits such as Morning Coffee,Rich Tea Fingers, Digestives,Gingers,and many others. At the snacks factory items such as KP Skips,Alien Spacers and Wickers are produced. For employees ,services such as a staff shop,and medical services are available.
